ygData.subject: Re: Guild or not, lets play together.
ygData.msgSnippet: Oops almost forgotten, I ve started my ultimate char (in the sense of having the best of both world and the style of play which suits me best), a human
ygData.messageBody:
Oops almost forgotten, I've started my "ultimate" char (in the sense of
having the best of both world and the style of play which suits me best), a
human paladin with 100 str. He's lvl 5 after 1 day of play. I hope to hit
lvl 8 or 9 tonite. Wish me luck.
His name is Garren.
----- Original Message -----
From: Alex <leealex@...>
To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, May 26, 1999 23:21
Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Guild or not, lets play together.


> From: "Alex" <leealex@...>
>
> Gary and I will be at "The Brotherhood" guild for monks.....other char r
> welcome too. check out the site.
>
> Yes, it be Great to have kakis playing together, be it same guild or not.
> Let create a Chat Channel so we can talk without me "tell " each one of u
> guys indivuallly.
>
> I play from 8:00- 9:30 pm on weekdays.
> this weekend , saturday is goin to be 4:00pm -3:00Am . aye 11 hrs of
EQing..
> yum yum 8-)
>
> Yiyang of Innoruuk.
>
>
> -----Original Message-----

> To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>

our
